overview:
Stuart Kerr is a seasoned technology start-up executive in NYC. He specializes in early stage high growth companies. 4 of his last 7 firms have had highly successful exits.

Having worked for Larry Ellison at Oracle and with Steve Jobs at both NeXT and Apple, Stuart learned how to build firms that lead their sector. Since then, Stuart has been CEO of ObjectStar and oversaw it’s growth and positive sale to Tibco. He was also an executive at theladders.com where he started and built up the profitable Enterprise division that monetized the company’s relationships with F500 firms. Following there, Stuart was an executive at KACE which was sold to Dell and also spent time at SelectMinds.

Currently Stuart is the SVP of Sales at FleetMatics/SageQuest where he has tripled sales in just under 2 years.

Stuart lives in Manhattan with his wife June and their 3 kids: Matthew, Rachel and Zoe.
